languages.text: "Когда же он набрал достаточно "добровольцев", Комиссар отправил меня и моих товарищей на особое задание: захват судна для побега. Он, видите ли, смог реквизировать портал, очень удобно ведущий прямо в верфь. Тварь. Я до сих пор помню его глумливую улыбку, когда я заходил в портал. Вел он, как вы могли догадаться, вовсе не к спасительному судну. Мы были просто скотом для его друкарских дружков, а наши муки и шок от предательства — аппетитной закуской. Мы пытались отбиваться как могли, но..." {n}Сержант мрачно замолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Когда же он набрал достаточно "добровольцев", Комиссар отправил меня и моих товарищей на особое задание: захват судна для побега. Он, видите ли, смог реквизировать портал, очень удобно ведущий прямо в верфь. Тварь. Я до сих пор помню его глумливую улыбку, когда я заходил в портал. Вел он, как вы могли догадаться, вовсе не к спасительному судну. Мы были просто скотом для его друкарских дружков, а наши муки и шок от предательства — аппетитной закуской. Мы пытались отбиваться как могли, но..." {n}Сержант мрачно замолкает.{/n}

languages.text: "Once he had found enough 'volunteers,' the Commissar sent me and the others on a special mission: to capture a ship for our escape. By an incredible stroke of luck, he got a hold of a portal that conveniently led straight to the docks. That creep. I still remember seeing the smug smile on his face as I entered the portal. As you may have figured, the portal didn't exactly lead to the vessel of our salvation. We were just cattle for his Drukhari cronies, and our misery and shock at having been betrayed was like a tasty snack for them. We fought back as best we could, but..." {n}The sergeant falls silent.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Когда же он набрал достаточно "добровольцев", Комиссар отправил меня и моих товарищей на особое задание: захват судна для побега. Он, видите ли, смог реквизировать портал, очень удобно ведущий прямо в верфь. Тварь. Я до сих пор помню его глумливую улыбку, когда я заходил в портал. Вел он, как вы могли догадаться, вовсе не к спасительному судну. Мы были просто скотом для его друкарских дружков, а наши муки и шок от предательства — аппетитной закуской. Мы пытались отбиваться как могли, но..." {n}Сержант мрачно замолкает.{/n}

By an incredible stroke of luck, he got ahold of a portal that conveniently led straight to the docks. That creep. I still remember seeing the smug smile on his face when I was entering the portal. As you may have figured, the portal didn't exactly lead to the vessel of our salvation. We were just cattle for his Drukhari cohorts, and our misery and shock at having been betrayed were their delectable morsel. We fought back as best we could, but..." {n}The sergeant falls silent.{/n}

"Once he had found enough 'volunteers,' the Commissar sent me and the others on a special mission: to capture a ship for our escape. By an incredible stroke of luck, he got a hold of a portal that conveniently led straight to the docks. That creep. I still remember seeing the smug smile on his face as I entered the portal. As you may have figured, the portal didn't exactly lead to the vessel of our salvation. We were just cattle for his Drukhari cronies, and our misery and shock at having been betrayed was like a tasty snack for them. We fought back as best we could, but..." {n}The sergeant falls silent.{/n}

languages.text: 「十分な数の"志願者"を見つけると、コミッサーは私と仲間を特別な任務に送り込みました。それは、脱出するために船を拿捕するという任務でした。信じられないような幸運に恵まれ、彼はドックに直接つながるポータルを手に入れました。あのクソ野郎。私がポータルに入ろうとしたとき、あの顔に微笑みが浮かんでいたのを今でも覚えています。お分かりかもしれないが、そのポータルは私たちを救う船につながるものではありませんでした。私たちはデュカーリたちにとっては家畜にすぎず、裏切られた私たちの惨めさや失望は、彼らにとっておいしいおやつのようなものでした。私たちは力の限り抵抗しましたが…」{n}軍曹は押し黙った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Once he had found enough 'volunteers,' the Commissar sent me and the others on a special mission: to capture a ship for our escape. By an incredible stroke of luck, he got a hold of a portal that conveniently led straight to the docks. That creep. I still remember seeing the smug smile on his face as I entered the portal. As you may have figured, the portal didn't exactly lead to the vessel of our salvation. We were just cattle for his Drukhari cronies, and our misery and shock at having been betrayed was like a tasty snack for them. We fought back as best we could, but..." {n}The sergeant falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「十分な数の"志願者"を見つけると、コミッサーは私と仲間を特別な任務に送り込みました。それは、脱出するために船を拿捕するという任務でした。信じられないような幸運に恵まれ、彼はドックに直接つながるポータルを手に入れました。あのクソ野郎。私がポータルに入ろうとしたとき、あの顔に微笑みが浮かんでいたのを今でも覚えています。お分かりかもしれないが、そのポータルは私たちを救う船につながるものではありませんでした。私たちはデュカーリたちにとっては家畜にすぎず、裏切られた惨めさとショックのにじむ私たち顔を見て彼らは非常に喜んだ。私たちは力の限り抵抗しましたが…」{n}軍曹は押し黙った。{/n}

languages.text: “等他找到了足够的‘志愿军’之后，他就派遣我们和其他人去执行一项特殊任务，夺走黑暗灵族的舰船，协助我们逃跑。而且很幸运，他找到了直接通往港口的传送门，那个混蛋。我还记得我迈进传送门的时候，他脸上露出了沾沾自喜的笑容。或许您也已经猜到了，传送门后面根本没有什么舰船。我们只不过是他手下的牲畜，我们被出卖时的痛苦与震惊，就是那些黑暗灵族的可口点心。我们已经尽可能地拼命反击了，可……”{n}军士沉默下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Once he had found enough 'volunteers,' the Commissar sent me and the others on a special mission: to capture a ship for our escape. By an incredible stroke of luck, he got a hold of a portal that conveniently led straight to the docks. That creep. I still remember seeing the smug smile on his face as I entered the portal. As you may have figured, the portal didn't exactly lead to the vessel of our salvation. We were just cattle for his Drukhari cronies, and our misery and shock at having been betrayed was like a tasty snack for them. We fought back as best we could, but..." {n}The sergeant falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “等他找到了足够的‘志愿军’之后，他就派遣我们和其他人去执行一项特殊任务，夺走黑暗灵族的舰船，协助我们逃跑。而且很幸运，他找到了直接通往港口的传送门，那个混蛋。我还记得我迈进传送门的时候，他脸上露出了沾沾自喜的笑容。或许您也已经猜到了，传送门后面根本没有什么舰船。我们只不过是他手下的牲畜，我们被出卖时的痛苦与震惊，就是那些黑暗灵族的美味佳肴。我们已经尽可能地拼命反击了，可……”{n}军士沉默下来。{/n}

languages.text: «Una vez que encontró suficientes "voluntarios", el Comisario nos envió a mí y a los demás a una misión especial: capturar una nave para nuestra huida. Por un increíble golpe de suerte, se hizo con un portal que llevaba directo a los muelles. Ese asqueroso. Aún recuerdo la sonrisa que se dibujó en su cara cuando entré en el portal. Como se habrá imaginado, el portal no conducía exactamente a la nave de nuestra salvación. No éramos más que ganado para sus compinches Drukhari, y nuestra miseria y conmoción por haber sido traicionados eran un delicioso bocado para ellos. Nos defendimos lo mejor que pudimos, pero...». {n}El sargento se calla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Once he had found enough 'volunteers,' the Commissar sent me and the others on a special mission: to capture a ship for our escape. By an incredible stroke of luck, he got a hold of a portal that conveniently led straight to the docks. That creep. I still remember seeing the smug smile on his face as I entered the portal. As you may have figured, the portal didn't exactly lead to the vessel of our salvation. We were just cattle for his Drukhari cronies, and our misery and shock at having been betrayed was like a tasty snack for them. We fought back as best we could, but..." {n}The sergeant falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Una vez que encontró suficientes "voluntarios", el Comisario nos envió a mí y a los demás a una misión especial: capturar una nave para nuestra huida. Por un increíble golpe de suerte, se hizo con un portal que llevaba directo a los muelles. Ese asqueroso. Aún recuerdo la sonrisa que se dibujó en su cara cuando yo entraba en el portal. Como se habrá imaginado, el portal no conducía exactamente a la nave de nuestra salvación. No éramos más que ganado para sus secuaces Drukhari, y nuestra miseria y conmoción por haber sido traicionados eran su delicioso bocado. Nos defendimos lo mejor que pudimos, pero...». {n}El sargento se calla.{/n}

languages.text: "Als er genügend 'Freiwillige' gefunden hatte, hat der Kommissar mich und die anderen auf eine spezielle Mission geschickt: ein Schiff für unsere Flucht zu kapern. Durch einen unglaublichen Glücksfall hat er ein Portal in die Finger bekommen, das praktischerweise direkt zu den Docks führt. Dieser Drecksack. Ich sehe noch sein dreckiges Grinsen vor mir, als ich in das Portal gegangen bin. Wie Ihr Euch vielleicht schon gedacht habt, hat das Portal nicht zum rettenden Schiff geführt. Wir waren nur Vieh für seine Drukhari-Lakaien, und unser Elend und Entsetzen angesichts des Verrats war für sie nur ein leckerer Snack. Wir haben uns nach Kräften gewehrt, aber ..." {n}Der Sergeant verstummt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Once he had found enough 'volunteers,' the Commissar sent me and the others on a special mission: to capture a ship for our escape. By an incredible stroke of luck, he got a hold of a portal that conveniently led straight to the docks. That creep. I still remember seeing the smug smile on his face as I entered the portal. As you may have figured, the portal didn't exactly lead to the vessel of our salvation. We were just cattle for his Drukhari cronies, and our misery and shock at having been betrayed was like a tasty snack for them. We fought back as best we could, but..." {n}The sergeant falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Als er genügend 'Freiwillige' gefunden hatte, hat der Kommissar mich und die anderen auf eine spezielle Mission geschickt: ein Schiff für unsere Flucht zu kapern. Durch einen unglaublichen Glücksfall hat er ein Portal in die Finger bekommen, das praktischerweise direkt zu den Docks führt. Dieser Drecksack. Ich sehe noch sein dreckiges Grinsen vor mir, als ich in das Portal gegangen bin. Wie Ihr Euch vielleicht schon gedacht habt, hat das Portal nicht zum rettenden Schiff geführt. Wir waren nur Vieh für seine Drukhari-Komplizen, und unser Elend und Entsetzen, dass wir verraten worden waren, waren für sie ein köstlicher Appetithappen. Wir haben uns nach Kräften gewehrt, aber ..." {n}Der Sergeant verstummt.{/n}

languages.text: « Quand il a eu assez de volontaires, le commissaire nous a envoyés, moi et les autres, accomplir une mission spéciale : capturer un vaisseau pour notre évasion. Par un incroyable concours de circonstances, il avait mis la main sur un portail menant directement aux quais... Comme par hasard. Quel sale type... Je n'oublierai jamais le sourire suffisant qu'il arborait quand j'ai traversé. Comme vous vous en doutez, le portail ne menait pas au vaisseau de notre salut. Non, il nous avait livrés en pâture aux cohortes drukharis, qui se sont délectées de notre détresse alors que nous étions encore sous le choc de cette odieuse trahison. On a résisté comme on a pu, mais... » {n}Le sergent n'en dit pas plus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Once he had found enough 'volunteers,' the Commissar sent me and the others on a special mission: to capture a ship for our escape. By an incredible stroke of luck, he got a hold of a portal that conveniently led straight to the docks. That creep. I still remember seeing the smug smile on his face as I entered the portal. As you may have figured, the portal didn't exactly lead to the vessel of our salvation. We were just cattle for his Drukhari cronies, and our misery and shock at having been betrayed was like a tasty snack for them. We fought back as best we could, but..." {n}The sergeant falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quand il a eu assez de volontaires, le commissaire nous a envoyés, moi et les autres, effectuer une mission spéciale : capturer un vaisseau pour notre évasion. Par un heureux concours de circonstances, il avait mis la main sur un portail menant directement aux quais. Comme par hasard. Quel sale type... Je n'oublierai jamais le sourire suffisant qu'il avait quand j'ai traversé. Comme vous vous en doutez, le portail ne menait pas au vaisseau de notre salut. Non, il nous avait livrés comme du bétail aux cohortes drukharis, qui se sont délectées de notre détresse alors que nous étions encore sous le choc de cette odieuse trahison. On a résisté comme on a pu, mais... » {n}Le sergent n'en dit pas plus.{/n}

languages.text: "Komiser, yeteri kadar "gönüllü" bulduğunda beni diğerleriyle birlikte özel bir misyona, kaçışımız için bir gemi ele geçirmeye gönderdi. Şansımız öylesine yaver gitmişti ki bizi hiçbir zorluk çekmeden, doğruca rıhtıma yönlendirecek bir portal bulmuştu. Şerefsiz herif... Ben Portala girerken ukala ukala sırıtması hâlâ aklımdan çıkmıyor. Portal, tahmin edeceğiniz üzere bizi kurtuluş umudumuz olan gemiye yönlendirmedi. Onun o Drukhari ahbaplarının gözünde sığırdan farksızdık. İhanete uğramamız karşısındaki perişanlığımız ve şaşkınlığımız, onlar için lezzetli bir mezeden ibaretti. Elimizden geldiğince karşı koyduk ama..." {n}Çavuş, sessizliğe bürünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Once he had found enough 'volunteers,' the Commissar sent me and the others on a special mission: to capture a ship for our escape. By an incredible stroke of luck, he got a hold of a portal that conveniently led straight to the docks. That creep. I still remember seeing the smug smile on his face as I entered the portal. As you may have figured, the portal didn't exactly lead to the vessel of our salvation. We were just cattle for his Drukhari cronies, and our misery and shock at having been betrayed was like a tasty snack for them. We fought back as best we could, but..." {n}The sergeant falls silent.{/n}

Şansımız öylesine yaver gitmişti ki bizi hiçbir zorluk çekmeden, doğruca rıhtıma yönlendirecek bir portal bulmuştu. Şerefsiz herif... Ben Portala girerken ukala ukala sırıtması hâlâ aklımdan çıkmıyor. Portal, tahmin edeceğiniz üzere bizi kurtuluş umudumuz olan gemiye yönlendirmedi. Onun o Drukhari ahbaplarının gözünde sığırdan farksızdık. İhanete uğramamız karşısındaki perişanlığımız ve şaşkınlığımız, onlar için lezzetli bir mezeden ibaretti. Elimizden geldiğince karşı koyduk ama..." {n}Çavuş, sessizliğe bürünüyor.{/n}
